MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH48 Postcode area of Bathgate, affecting a number of customers in the local area. We had no advance warning of the power cut and only became aware of it at 3.35am. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers are on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a blown fuse at the Green Tree substation. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10.00am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.07am on the 19th April 2021.
